subject: For Early Release of retention money.

DWARKA NEW DELHI-{10045 91-11-5080360 No. 11041/21/2002/Admn-III March 3, 2004 POLICY MATTERS-ADMINISTRATIONIFINANCE (77/2004) Decision taken on Finance Division fille No. NHAIF& APolicy Matters/2o03/210) Kindly refer to the guidelines prescribed (vide policy circular no.29/2002 dated   20/12/2002) for   early   release of retention money. Further to these guidelines, it was also   prescribed vide policy. circular no_ 52/2003 dated 28/8/2003 that the early release of retention money would henceforth bear an interest 6% per annum_ 2_ In this regard, PIUs have been  seeking clarification aS to whether the retention  money released before issuance of policy circular no 52/2003 dated 28/8/2003 would also attract interest 6%/ per annum Or not It is clarified that interest 6% per annur will be charged only in Tespect of release of retention money in future (i.e, On O after 28/8/2003) without affecting the releases already made to the issuance of policy circular no 52/2003 dated 28/8/2003. 3_ This issues with the approval of Chairman.
